lead_paragraph: After appearing lost in a crowded Republican field, the Ohio governor has been enjoying a wave of attention in the first primary state as a serious and nonangry candidate.

headline.print_headline: With Calm and Experience, Kasich Connects in New Hampshire
headline.main: With Calm and Experience, John Kasich Connects in New Hampshire

snippet: After appearing lost in a crowded Republican field, the Ohio governor has been enjoying a wave of attention in the first primary state as a serious and nonangry candidate.
abstract: Ohio Gov John Kasich is enjoying bump in polls in New Hampshire, receiving endorsements from several newspapers in state in advance of its Republican presidential primary; Kasich has drawn independent voters in state with message focused on balanced budgets and working with Democrats, crucial factor in state that allows independents to vote in primaries of either party.
